name: twamm
description: An implementation of [TWAMM](https://www.paradigm.xyz/2021/07/twamm/), an AMM design by [@\_Dave\_\_White\_](https://twitter.com/_Dave__White_), [@danrobinson](https://twitter.com/danrobinson) and [@haydenzadams](https://twitter.com/haydenzadams). TWAMM allows market participants to efficiently execute large orders over multiple blocks.
